name: Shing Tennis
description:
WSAD to move, left click /  right click to swing. Can't get that much simpler (that's not true, at one point the character auto-moves and auto-selects left or right swing)

Report your high score in the discord : https://discord.gg/PbC7eqD as there may be prizes.

Also follow my twitter : twitter.com/shingpapi
